alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 10:28PM CDT until April 19 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Lincoln County in central Oklahoma... North central Pottawatomie County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1028 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Meeker, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Meeker, Johnson, Sparks, and Aydelotte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
